website_summaries.verdict: A good blanket from a reputable manufacturer, backed by excellent customer service.
pros: Good fit for the mattress size
Includes mechanisms to protect against overheating and other useful safety features
Thin and flexible with stylish shell
cons: Rare problems with pilling and shrinking
Not quite as well-insulated as competitors

customer_reviews.title: Shop Other Vendors
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Serta Luxe Plush is the EXACT same blanket as the one that Soft Heat sells FOR LESS. The exact same! I had problems with my Soft Heat blankets and thought I was “upgrading” to Serta, but when I received the blanket I compared the labels on the blanket as well as the labels on the controllers. Both labels refer to the maker as Perfect Fit.
customer_reviews.author: Al Stickland

customer_reviews.title: Open the blanket and try settings and make sure the blanket warms before the return period.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second heating blanket and although the return window is closed i cannot send back for a replacement. I just opened the blanket and put in on the bed, three days ago, but lo and behold there was no warming in one third of the blanket. It has cold spots in the blanket about 1/3 of the blanket will not warm. This is my second Serta low voltage blanket and the first one last 4 years. I will have to buy another one just too expensive to replace again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: useless. Cheap product and lies when it comes to ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 4 months. I purchased a warranty from Squaretrade and they told me it was still under manufacture warranty, but it's not real, you can't find out how to redeem it. So: useless. Cheap product and lies when it comes to claiming it's under warranty. Don't bother buying the amazon warranty either. It's all a racket.
customer_reviews.author: Annette M. Gilson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY from Perfect Fit !! SCAMMERS!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket for my ailing Grand who is always cold, on 15 May, 2020. The Blanket stopped working on 2 July, 2020, it didn’t last 2 months. The reseller who sells this blanket on Amazon for Serta, is not a reputable company. They have a customer service number where the mailbox is always full, a product review page that doesn’t exist, and also never return emails. This is a SCAM!! I doubt this is even a real Serta blanket, but a bootleg of Serta blankets. A blanket that cost me 155.65 dollars should last more than 2 months. SCAM, SCAM, SCAM!! Don’t Buy from Perfect Fit!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee G.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST ELECTRIC BLANKET - BUT???
customer_reviews.text: It really is the best electric blanket I’ve owned! The heat is even, because of the way it’s made, with the wires close together. You can hardly feel them, unlike many other brands. —- It would be 5 stars, But, I paid $129.98 & very shortly after I bought it, the price went up to $209.99. An increase of $80.01. Great for me! BUT WHY? I’ll check things more closely. NOW (12/15/17), it’s $140.20. all Queen????
customer_reviews.author: Janet L

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy, heat is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: For years I have been trying to buy my wife a heating blanket. Wires were always too noticeable, we could feel them, heat ranges were low. With this blanket you CAN NOT FEEL the wires, and you can tell the difference between the settings 1-10 (allowing true customization throughout the night if needed (we turn it to 8 30 minutes before getting into bed, then down to 3 once we are in, providing warmth throughout the night. And the best part the dual controls, we can each customize our side! Great value for the price - We live in Park City Utah - it was 9 degrees this morning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, but it broke
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the material. You can barely feel the wires inside. You need two separate plugs for it. Stopped working after about a year though...need to get it replaced...
customer_reviews.author: Justin Ford

customer_reviews.title: Serta customer service will not respond - don’t buy this blanket!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this blanket for less than 3 months and one of the controllers went out. Have tried calling Serta customer service, you can only can leave a message for a call back. Tried repeatedly and still can’t reach a live person to help. Also sent an email to their customer service email address, one month later still no response to that either. A piece of junk, I would recommend you do not invest dollars in this blanket if it is only going to fail.
customer_reviews.author: rendaren

customer_reviews.title: The best electric blanket ever
customer_reviews.text: Best electric blanket I've ever had. It is very soft and fuzzy. Extremely lightweight. But also warm. Once you warm up the blanket, you can turn it off and be comfortable all night. The blanket has enough substance to keep you warm without electricity. Unusual for an electric blanket. Bought the ivory color, quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about a week!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM! I purchased this blanket in the beginning of September. It did not get cool enough here to use it until the beginning of October. After about a week of use one side of the blanket started working intermittently. After less than two weeks it does not work at all. I cannot return it since I have had the blanket for more than 30 days. I tried calling the help line and both the technical help line and warranty line ended up dumping me in a voicemail black-hole. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathierine Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, very even, unobtrusive heat when you need it.
customer_reviews.text: If it weren't for the cords under the bed. and the ability to dial up the heat, I wouldn't know this is an electric blanket. The wires within the fabric are very unobtrusive, and the heat is very even. The blanket itself is warm, even without the power on, but the combination of fine adjustment and even heat make this the best electric blanket I have ever had. I haven't cranked it all the way up and don't expect to, so you could say I haven't fully tested it. I don't test products, I use them, so YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: dbTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: nice and soft but when I went to return it ...
customer_reviews.text: It does NOT work after 3 weeks!!!! Worked well in beginning..nice and soft but when I went to return it is says: NO RETURNS AFTER 30 DAYS! Thats some great customer service. Buyer beware my last one worked for almost 2 years.. not from Serta. Guess there is a reason for the only 30 day exchange policy. My first post on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Weitzman

customer_reviews.title: Controllers already stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is nice and toasty, but I've had it for 37 days and the right controller has already quit working. I'm trying to get a replacement from Serta customer service but they don't answer their phone. I paid more than $200 for this blanket and they can't answer their phone during normal business hours? If I don't get a replacement controller ASAP, this review is going down to one star.
customer_reviews.author: Remy

customer_reviews.title: looking for replacement, stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I like the blanket very much. However, it turns off about ten seconds after I turn it on. It is slightly over two years old. How can I get it fixed or replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: I spent a significant amount of time looking for a US manufactured product, but the reviews for longevity, quality and performance were pretty dismal. After weighing environmental, convenience and cost, I chose this product. The quality and performance are the best I ever experienced with an electric blanket and time will tell about the longevity. It warms quickly evenly and well and is soft with no heavy wires
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Rose

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable and WARM
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and wanted to get a warm blanket that did not weigh a ton and that had small internal wires. Success. The less joyful finding is the control. It is completely inelegant (code word for does not look good) and when you put it on the nightstand the control setting faces away from the bed.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Brady

customer_reviews.title: You can barely feel the wires so that is nice. I do not know if it is all ...
customer_reviews.text: You can barely feel the wires so that is nice. I do not know if it is all electric blankets or me, but the upper part is too warm but my feet are still cold. Too bad it cannot sense where the heat is needed! Color and texture are nice.
customer_reviews.author: allegro

customer_reviews.title: Serta Luxe Plush Low-Voltage Electric Heated Blanket
customer_reviews.text: This electric blanket is not the fitted sheet type blanket but I use it that way to lay on instead of using it as a cover type blanket. This one has the 10 hour shut off timer instead of the goofy 3 hour timer most other blankets uses. It does not get so hot that it makes you perspire like the old style blankets did. Other reviews said the blanket stopped working after a short time. This one I got has been going strong every night this winter for me. I don't know?
customer_reviews.author: Mike from Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Rip off. Company not real?
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after a few weeks. I have tried calling the 800-number and also emailed four times with no response. They don’t answer their phone or their emails. I’m stuck with a blanket that cost $122 that doesn’t work and is supposed to have a five year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, warm UT winter RV solution.
customer_reviews.text: Soft beautiful comfy material. Easy, effective temperature control dial. Preheat works really fast. The wire heat element is hardly noticeable. Super economical, compared to heating an entire room or RV all night.
customer_reviews.author: CamoBands™ by X-BANDS™

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this electric blanket. Multiple settings. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L. Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Hope your feet don't get too cold!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket has certain areas that become hot-spots and then other areas that don't ever seem to get warm. I would not buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT heating blanket. Very soft and warms gently up and down the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: George A. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: At Last!  No noticeable wires!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third electric blanket I've ordered on-line. Even though the first two boasted of "Ultra-Thin" wires...they had very prominent wires that were way to thick. This blanket is soft and plush and you can hardly notice the wires. I'm very pleased. The Saffire Blue is a soft subtle color, but still rich and very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Kris H. Imbrie

customer_reviews.title: Love my new blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this blanket. Its a little heavier than I thought it would be. But keeps me really warm! I have hot flashes now, so I rarely have to turn on the blanket. But my husband says he uses his side all the time, and it keeps him nice and toasty warm. His only comment is that he feels the controls are cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Denice Zabinski

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my bed. It lived up to all that was advertised! Light weight, soft, absolutely no gaps in heating and I don’t feel any wires when in use!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son on the East coast ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son on the East coast. He turned it on for hours two nights in a row and nothing. No heat at all. I got a full refund and they didn't want the blanket back
customer_reviews.author: Una Werner

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: We like this on our bed in our mountain home. We turn it onto high when we first get into bed and then turn it all the way down to low before we fall asleep and it keeps the sheets from getting cold and doesn't make us sweat all night.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Blevins

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT WORK PLUS WRONG SIZE- DONT BUY IT, WASTE OF $129
customer_reviews.text: FIrst of all, I paid for a full size, however it was a twin size. Instead of returning it, I decided to make it work. I waited until this fall when it was really cold and put it on top of the bed, small as it was, and turned it on. It turned on fine, but immediately turned off. It never heated up and it refuses to stay on. It has been months since I bought it so I assume too late to return. What a waste!!! DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, low lifespan.
customer_reviews.text: One side stopped working after approximately 5 months. Less than a year after purchasing both sides are completely dead.
customer_reviews.author: Arc

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, lightweight and yet keeps you warn even ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, lightweight and yet keeps you warn even in cold winter. Not like the old type which heated up like a heating pad. You have to get used to the idea that this blanket feels barely warm when you get into bed but then you realize it works with your body heat and keeps you very warm like a down comforter without the bulk. Love it. This is the second year we are using it.
customer_reviews.author: linda durdov

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fast warming, even temperature throughout. I like the auto shut off after 10 hour feature.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket, stitched poorly
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this blanket 5 stars because it performs beautifully. However, the sewing of the top "hem" is uneven and puckered in places. It looks as though a novice did the stitching. I wouldn't expect this from such an expensive blanket. It really detracts from an otherwise great blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Wheels

customer_reviews.title: serves as a regular blanket as well as heated
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because if I do not want to use the heat, I do not have to. I can disconnect (or just not turn on) the heated portion of the blanket. The only annoying thing is then you feel the port on the blanket (if you roll over) where you input the heater. I personally tend to sweat too much when I sleep with this with the heat on.
customer_reviews.author: Carly W

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even last 5 months of very light use
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 1 star I would. This blanket quit working within the first season of use. It was not even used every night or even every week. You would think it would last longer than 5 months. I wish I could return this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good I don’t feel any wire. I am happy to have this blanket
customer_reviews.author: Mina Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Saves big $$&&
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Saves big $$$ turning furnace down at night.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: bought in May and in July one of the controllers quit working. Tried to contact Serta about replacing the controller but no response. Wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Horse Feathers

customer_reviews.title: The blanket doesn't stay on. After weeks of plugging ...
customer_reviews.text: The blanket doesn't stay on. After weeks of plugging, unplugging and trying all the usual tricks, I gave up and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A christmas gift my wife loves!
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift that my wife truly appreciated! She has been wanting a new electric blanket for a few years now and managed to get 9 years out of her old one! I hope this New model last just as long or longer.
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: Best there is
customer_reviews.text: This by far is the best heated blanket I have ever had. Warms up great and stays warm evenly. The material is soft.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is great. Warm, soft and not flimsy. Wires are hardly noticeable. There is a piece loose in one of the control units rattling around. So far it isn't causing any problem and I hope it is just an annoyance and not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Dolan

customer_reviews.title: TOO warm
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and actually TOO warm. LO is still too warm for me, but my husband loves it. I'd like a slightly different fabric, the only reason I'm giving it a 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Medical Humanities

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, yummy warm heated bliss!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket exceeded my expectations! Warm, soft and super comfortable, this blanket makes crawling into bed on a cold winters night a welcome treat! The temp controls are easy to read, regulate and even the very lowest setting offers the ideal temperature for crawling into bed. LOVE this blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Bichon2chic

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice even heat with no cold spots. It keeps me toasty warm all night long and the controls are silent. My old blanket made a loud click whenever it turned on so I sure don't miss that!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Pantalones

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this blanket
customer_reviews.text: - The electric blankets I've purchased from Target always die after the first winter - That really annoyed me. - This blanket is clearly high quality and the electrical components have some heft to them. - I highly recommend this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ansell

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Living in Texas, our weather changes from freezing to 80 in a day so it is nice to have a light weight blanket that heats up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very soft Didn't work when I got it Returned for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft Didn't work when I got it Returned for full refund. Refund came quickly
customer_reviews.author: Asphalt Angel

customer_reviews.title: This is best electric blanket I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is best electric blanket I've ever used! You can't feel the wires, heats evenly and very soft and lofty! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Soft as a Cloud
customer_reviews.text: Looked for two years for just that perfect blanket. This blanket is everything I dreamed it would be.....it should be called the Cloud. It is plush soft with no bulky wires. The cord is long enough to reach the outlet without stretching the wires. It is a pleasure to go to a nice warm bed on a chilly night. Heat stays consistent and you can turn down your house thermostat. Would recommend this item and repurchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Wish the plug that connects to the blanket ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Wish the plug that connects to the blanket was located in a better spot. very clumsy at the foot of the bed. blanket works good.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Tone

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Plug in piece is a flimsy piece of plastic (extremely small), little wires became exposed and broke after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: tawni mcglothlin

customer_reviews.title: Broken controller
customer_reviews.text: I used my product one night and everything was fine but the second night, one of the controllers stopped working. So half of my heated blanket won’t work. I will ether return or ask for another controller to be sent to me
customer_reviews.author: Marlee Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Low & bad quality of product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the s blanket a month ago and soon as I open the box and try to use it but it just didn’t work. Such a bad quality and now I can not return. It’s new but not working.
customer_reviews.author: Eun J Oh

customer_reviews.title: WOW BEST BLANKET EVER!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow. Nice heavy blanket, can't feel wires and it is evenly warm from one end to the other. And warms up very quick. Love everything about it! Only bad thing is the twin cost as much as a queen but OMG what a blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Miss OJ Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Cossy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits right. Looks & feels great. I would buy again & do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T Fehrer

customer_reviews.title: the blanket is really too short. if I could ...
customer_reviews.text: the blanket is really too short. if I could sew, i'd put an extenson the bottom. it's really a little narrow, also, I wish I had ordered a King size, for my Queen size bed. (when we get into the bed, there's nothing on our side to cover us.
customer_reviews.author: jake smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked during the winter season the first year then one side stopped working. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jmartin2306

customer_reviews.title: Soft, luxurious, but not hot hot hot
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, nice weight. But not roasting hot for my wife's taste. Maybe safety requirements don't allow manufacturers to make them as warm as they used to. Probably not a problem for 95% of the population.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Myatt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the blanket. You can't feel the wires and it is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H.

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful and safe
customer_reviews.text: High marks! It's wonderful and safe! I've been thinking about putting it into a duvet cover in order to keep it pristine. Anybody got any thoughts on that?
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: later we still like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: 6 wks. later we still like it a lot. Slow to heat up but you won't feel a wire. Soft. Very Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ben L.

customer_reviews.title: and they LOVE it! Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my In Laws, and they LOVE it! Very soft, and you cannot feel any wires. Heats evenly and is a great buy, very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product ever. It stopped working after four months. You can't return it and the warranty is useless. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a gift and the recipient was so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Molly's mom

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned it because the connectors were loose, so it wouldn't stay on. Also, each control has a rather large control box that I thought were unattractive and clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product has been superior to what I had before and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: David D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Very Very Nice electric Blanket. Not too heavy.......wires are very tiny Plush fabric stays nice and does not ball up.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara V

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this blanket
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this blanket. It heats fast and is light weight. I like that the wires are not big and noticable. I would recommend this blanket as a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M White

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. But it quit after only a month or so..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the color
customer_reviews.text: The blanket arrived in plenty of time before Christmas and the blanket is warm and heavy enough even without the heat on. I like the color, and the control knobs are easy to use. I bought one for a gift and one for myself. I'm very please with it and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we are very happy with how quickly the bed becomes comfy in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though earlier reviews talked about how long it takes the blanket to warm up, we are very happy with how quickly the bed becomes comfy in the evening. The pre-heat feature is a godsend, as my wife hates getting into a cold bed.
customer_reviews.author: John Sims

customer_reviews.title: Heat controls are poorly made, switch came broken
customer_reviews.text: Controls are so cheap one side was broken before we ever used it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. Sutter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far just what we expected. Gives even heat. Made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: We do not want to get out of bed anymore. Heat is great and it's sooo comfortable. We're happy.
customer_reviews.author: jpvela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best electric blanket I have owned. Does everything it states and more. I loved it so much I shared with my mom and she bought one too!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Does it's  job during a cold Winter's night
customer_reviews.text: Works very nicely. Heats up quickly. Auto shut-off is a handy feature.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her husband fight over this!! LOVE, LOVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Pekarek

customer_reviews.title: It was great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was great for the price. Couldn't find one with separate zones. I only need to keep my feet warm!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me very warm on cold nights. Its a good blanket even if you don't turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Cat L

customer_reviews.title: Southern comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is everything we had hoped for, and everything it was advertised to be. It shuts off automatically, it provides comfy warmth on demand, the size is perfect for our California King, it is smart and stylish and blends in with our bedroom décor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket! Very nice, great controls and nice even heat.
customer_reviews.author: Judith C. Andersonbauer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The blanket didn't even last 4 months. I spent more money on it hoping it would last longer. Really disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: JayRob11

customer_reviews.title: We just love this electric blanket
customer_reviews.text: We just love this electric blanket. Its light weight and heats with a very even heat. A separate control for each side makes it easy to adjust for each side.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Iorlano

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as expected. Plug for cord to ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as expected. Plug for cord to blanket can be a little difficult to locate when setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful blanket! Light weight, warm, and very comfortable. It was well packaged and shipped on time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Oertel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as warm as i thought it would be. We are still thinking about returning it
customer_reviews.author: matt matuga

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but does not get warm before you get in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The heater part already stopped working! The blanket part is nice, but only two months of sporadic use and the electric part stopped working. I will look to purchase that part, but for so much money, it should be warrantied.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our new electric blanket - it is light weight and nice and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Had it approximately 6 months and it is falling apart. The plug connection at the blanket has pulled out of the blanket and now two small wires are showing. I don't even know if it is safe. Not worth the money and hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Just Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: IT IS WHAT I EXPECTED IT TO BE. IT WORKS VERY WELL.
customer_reviews.author: harold cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is awesome. Everything I'm looking for: thin wires, soft, matches my bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McKillroy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s just what l had in mind!Its warm and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box one controller did not work. It would turn off after a few seconds. The second controller did not turn off, but the blanket did not get warm. I have returned the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Rural User

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I are very happy with our purchase.Light-weight, Low heat, means comfortable sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbert E. Lofty Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The warmth is great but the material is too slippery and it and ...

product_meta.title: Serta | Luxe Plush Fleece Heated Electric Blanket with Safe & Warm Low-Voltage Technology Queen Pearl
product_meta.description:
Color:Pearl| Size:QueenWe've designed the Serta low voltage blanket with one thing in mind. To be the best, most comfortable and safest blanket that you will ever own. This electric blanket starts with super soft micro-fleece fabric that is refreshingly smooth next to your skin for the ultimate in luxurious comfort. Constructed within the blanket is the patented Safe and Warm low-voltage technology. This blanket includes a small power supply box that changes 120 volt AC home current into non-hazardous low-voltage DC current (very similar to a battery) to provide warmth, protection and safety even if the blanket becomes wet. Unlike other warming blankets with their thick bulky wires, the wires in the Serta blankets are so small and thin; they are virtually unnoticeable. During construction we place the thin wires 3-inches apart and evenly distribute them from head to toe giving more of an even heat and all over penetrating warmth with no annoying hot or cold spots. The queen size blanket is divided in two separate zones and comes standard with two easy to read, easy to turn, non-slip computerized controllers to adjust the temperature of each side of the bed giving individual comfort and control. A giant backlit display with auto dimming feature provides more convenience for night time adjustments with out having to turn on the lights. An automatic pre-heat and hold feature makes sure that your bed is warm and cozy before you climb in for the night. You simply turn it on and the blanket will warm up on HI until it reaches the temperature that you pre set your dial on and then adjusts itself to hold it there. For your safety, convenience and power conservation it has an automatic shut off feature that will shut the blanket off after 10 hours just in case you forget. It also comes standard with built in over-temperature protection for that extra bit of safety and peace of mind. Easy care feature means that it's machine washable and dryable and will not stretch, pill or shrink.

This warming product has been designed to provide you a gentle relaxing heat. It will NOT feel warm to the touch of your hand, even on the highest (HI) setting.
You must actually use it to experience the cozy warmth that it will generate.
If the control lamp is lit, it is working. We suggest you start at the HI setting for the first use and then adjust down to your personal comfort level. To receive the most pleasure from your warming product, read your User Manual.

You must actually use it to experience the cozy warmth that it will generate.
If the control lamp is lit, it is working. We suggest you start at the HI setting for the first use and then adjust down to your personal comfort level. To receive the most pleasure from your warming product, read your User Manual. Never use dry cleaning fluid on this product. Cleaning solvents may damage the wiring insulation
feature_bullets: MATERIALS: Made of incredibly soft micro-plush fabric with built in micro-thin wires for more even heat distribution without the bulkiness.

FEATURES: Patented Safe & Warm non-hazardous low voltage technology is safe in the presence of moisture, will not harm pets, and emits no EMFs. Our patented low voltage technology is the only electric mattress pad technology that is certified as non-hazardous. Single control automatically shuts off after 10 hours for convenience. Giant backlit display with auto dimming feature for night time adjustments with out having to turn on the lights
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Machine washable and dryable without any pilling, shrinking or stretching
